summary: Add the enchantment to weapon temporary using spell
descriptionHtml:
Add the fire, frost, and shock damage to an [b]unenchanted weapon[/b] temporary.
The enchantment are affected by perks from the destruction tree.

MORE TO BE ADDED

The spells are Lesser power so you can use it for all type of unenchanted weapon.

It CANNOT be disenchanted to be learn and doesn\'t effect the selling of the weapon.
If dual wield both weapon get enchanted with same effect

It can be bought in Whiterun - Temple of Kynareth from Jenssen.

-------------------------------------------------
-22/12/12
-------------------------------------------------
Added Enchantments
Paralyze
Fear
Fury
AbHealth
AbMagicka
AbStamina

perks effect them as well
Fear/Fury Illusion tree
Paralyze Alteraion perk stability
abHealth/abMagicka/abStamina restoration perk regeneration

i don\'t plan to add calm as they would just stand there like paralyze or not attack you as you attack them (game ruining).

---------------------------------------
INSTALLING/UNINSTALLING
---------------------------------------
download with NMM or extract and put into data folder
to remove just uninstall with NMM or delete weapon buff.esp in data folder




I would like it to be castable with magicka as spell but i don\'t know how because if i did it then it would require the use of one hand, making it work for one-hand only.
